title: Any hutment dweller who is in actual occupation or possession of more than one hutment within the jurisdiction of S
clause_text: Any hutment dweller who is in actual occupation or possession of more than one hutment within the jurisdiction of S.R.A. Pune shall not be held eligible for more than one rehab unit. The eligibility of a person including transferees in case of Protected Occupier under the
section: Provision relating to allotment of tenements either in situ or otherwise, on ownership or on rent to the other non-protected occupiers
